short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make quick notes for quick moments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple memo.

We have made it so that it has no unnecessary features and is very simple for anyone to use.

In addition to using it as just a memo, you can also use it to write down your great ideas so you don't forget them.


<Specifications>
1,You can save with the Save button and delete everything with the Delete button.

2,You can write memos up to 5000 characters.


シンプルなメモです。

難しい無駄な機能を持たせずに必要最低限にしましたのでストレスなく使うことが出来ると思います。

Saveボタンで保存、Deleteボタンで全削除ができます。
5000文字以内まで書けます。
